scripts.//: NOTE: cloc is GPL-2.0 and must be installed locally
scripts.count-loc: npm run count-loc:client && npm run count-loc:server
scripts.licenseChecker: npm run licenseChecker:client && npm run licenseChecker:server
scripts.licenseChecker:client: cd client && cross-conf-env npm run licenseChecker -- --onlyAllow=npm_package_config_allowedLicenses --excludePackages=npm_package_config_packageLicenseWhitelist
scripts.licenseChecker:server: cd server && cross-conf-env npm run licenseChecker -- --onlyAllow=npm_package_config_allowedLicenses --excludePackages=npm_package_config_packageLicenseWhitelist
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.test: npm run seed && server-test start "http-get://localhost:3000|http-get://localhost:3001" test:client
scripts.testGui: npm run seed && server-test start "http-get://localhost:3000|http-get://localhost:3001" testGui:client
